amendment.description: An amendment numbered 26 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to reduce funding level for the Delta Regional Commission to the FY19 level.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Delta Regional Commission by $6,100,000, and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 123 - 300 (Roll no. 537).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 123 - 300 (Roll no. 537).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
